com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils.ScriptData

  • Packages that use ScriptData 
    Package Description
    com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils  

    • Uses of ScriptData in com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils

      Methods in com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils that return ScriptData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScriptData ScriptArgumentComposer.getArgument(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, and add the length to the offset of argument buffer.
      ScriptData ScriptArgumentComposer.getArgumentAll()
      Get all the rest argument buffer.
      ScriptData ScriptArgumentComposer.getArgumentRightJustified(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, if the data length is not long enough, padding zero on the left-side to the specified length.
      ScriptData ScriptArgumentComposer.getArgumentUnion(int offset, int length)
      Get specified range long argument data, and won't change the offset of argument buffer.
      ScriptData ScriptArgumentComposer.getArgumentVariableLength(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, but the actual usage length defined in BufferInt.
      static ScriptData ScriptData.getBufer(ScriptData.Buffer bufferType, int offset, int length) 
      static ScriptData ScriptData.getDataBufferAll(ScriptData.Buffer buf)

      Check whether the data is in range of asc-ii code encode (0x20~0x7e, except 0x23(")) or not.

      static String ScriptAssembler.hash(ScriptData data, ScriptData.Buffer destinationBuf, int hashType)
      Bech32 hash data and put the output to destination buffer.
      static String ScriptAssembler.ifEqual(ScriptData argData, String expect, String trueStatement, String falseStatement)
      If argData equals to expect, the the card execute the trueStatement, otherwise execute the falseStatement.
      static String ScriptAssembler.ifRange(ScriptData argData, String min, String max, String trueStatement, String falseStatement)
      If the value of argData lies between min and max(min ≤ argData ≤ max) then run trueStatement; if not, please run falseStatement.
      static String ScriptAssembler.ifSigned(ScriptData argData, ScriptData signData, String trueStatement, String falseStatement)
      Use CoolBitX public key to verify that the signature is valid or not.

      Protobuf decode data put the output to transaction buffer.
